TopicTitle: Is there a mod to change the look of the launch pad?

Articles.Content:
Are there any mods that change the Launch pad? If so, could someone direct me to it? I'm wanting to have the launch pad look like Launch pad 39-B as it did during the space shuttle program with the Fixed Service Structure and Rotating Service Structure..

Edited February 20, 2018 by ExplicitPaarthurnax
While I don't know if its the case, its probably doable by using Kerbal Konstructs.
